T02abhnispu:2: jyotibhir vijitaṃ yad asya jagatīṃ jiṣṇv antaratvatamo (?)
T02abhnispu:3: yac cādvaitadaśārṇasaty api parīṇāmo guṇaughaḥ śriyām /
T02abhnispu:6: tair etac caritādbhutāni nijadhīdhāmāni dhāvantu vaḥ //
T02abhnispu:8: tadañcitais tadvacanirmitaughair amogham agryāṃ śriyam ādadhātu //
T02abhnispu:9: iha hi mṛdumadhyakramābhyāṃ subhāvitasamādher adhimātraprajñasya bhagavatā /
T02abhnispu:12: sa hi tvāṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca vajradharatvaṃ prāpayitum abhyutsāhavān skandhadhātvāyatanādikaṃ pratibimbamayaṃ śūnyataikarasaṃ niścinvan /
T02abhnispu:15: dharmadeśanādibhir yathābhavyaṃ parahitāni kurvāṇaḥ parapuṇyāvadhiṃ sthāpayan saṃharaṃś cācintya mūrtir udeti //
T02abhnispu:17: ārasātalam abhimataprasarā ghanaikasārā jvalantī vajramayī bhūmiḥ kalpāntajvalanavanamayūkhajvālāvalīsīmābandhā /
T02abhnispu:21: tatra pūrvasyām ārāyāṃ yamāntakaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sitaraktamukhaḥ kṛṣṇavajramudgarakhaḍgamaṇikamaladhārī /
T02abhnispu:32: tatroṣṇīṣaṭakkyacalasumbhā ratnamukuṭino vicitraratnābharaṇā lalitā īṣaddarśitadaṃṣṭrā vigataśmaśravaḥ /
T02abhnispu:33: tadanye vikṛtarūpāḥ sabhrūbhaṅgāḥ piṅgordhvakeśabhrūśmaśravo vyāvṛttadaṃṣṭrākarālavaktrā lalajjihvā aṭṭāṭṭahāsinaḥ krūrāṣṭanāgabhūṣanā vāmanāḥ pīnās tundilāḥ /
T02abhnispu:34: daśāpy ete sahāsanair niścalāḥ pratyālīḍhenārāgreṣv īṣadalagnaviśvābjasūryasthāḥ
T02abhnispu:36: aparimitātmakamūrtinirmāṇaiś ca niravadhidhātutrayeṣu vighnaugham akhilam asakṛnnirmūlayantaḥ /
T02abhnispu:38: mukhaṃ tu mūlaṃ śariravarṇaṃ savyavāmaṃ ca yathoktavarṇaṃ pratimukhaṃ raktavartulanetratrayam //
T02abhnispu:40: cakraṃ cātibhramaṇān niścalopamaṃ nirantaraṃ sphurad anekajvālākalāpaṃ tasya nābhyantare
T02abhnispu:42: viśvakuliśasahitā tadvajrasya digārā yathāyogaṃ vairocanādisamavarṇā vedī ca /
T02abhnispu:44: tasya madhye bhagavān vajrasattvo mañjuvajrarūpaḥ kuṅkumāruṇaḥ kṛṣṇasitasavyetaravadanaḥ
T02abhnispu:46: tasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi vairocanaḥ sitaḥ kṛṣṇaraktasavyetaramukhaḥ sitāṣṭāracakrāsimaṇikamaladharaḥ /
T02abhnispu:50: trayo 'mī kṛṣṇasitasavyetaravaktrāḥ sarve tathāgatā ratnamukuṭino vicitraratnābharaṇāḥ /
T02abhnispu:53: māmakī akṣobhyasamā raktotpalāsimaṇipadmadharā sarvasādhaneṣu tathā pāṭhāt /
T02abhnispu:56: ato garbhapuṭād bahir āgneyakoṇe rūpavajrā vairocanasadṛśī ratnadarpaṇāsimaṇyabjadharā /
T02abhnispu:67: atra mañjuvajravairocanadaśadevyaś candreṣu vajraparyaṅkiṇo 'nye sūryeṣu candrasūryataleṣu viśvapadmāni /
T02abhnispu:68: tathāgatāḥ pradhānabhujābhyāṃ svābhaprajñāliṅgitā devyas tu svābham upāyam //
T02abhnispu:79: iha mañjuvajrasya stanāntare samayasattvasadṛśaṃ jñānasattvaṃ taddhṛccandre khaḍgamuṣṭicandrasthaṃ maṃbījam /
T02abhnispu:80: śāśvataratneśāmitābhāmoghasiddhyakṣobhyānāṃ hṛdi cihne yathāyogaṃ candre sūrye vā vuṃ āṃ jrīṃ khaṃ hūṃ /
T02abhnispu:81: locanādidevīnāṃ Ioṃ māṃ pāṃ tāṃ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ khaṃ raṃ /
T02abhnispu:85: iha niṣpannayoginaś cakṣurādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ jñānasattvapraveśādikaṃ ca noktam //
T02abhnispu:86: tadantareṇāpy aparimitācintyacakṣurabhijñādiguṇagrāmaramaṇīyamūrter abhīṣṭadevatāyāḥ sakṛd eva supariśuddhasarvākārapariniṣpatter muhur muhur adhimokṣadārḍhyāt /
T02abhnispu:88: yadā tu madhye 'nyas tathāgato bhavati nāyakas tadā madhyasthitas tasya sthāne tiṣṭhet /
T02abhnispu:89: amitābhaḥ śubhro 'pi bhavati śuklā dharmāḥ prakṛtyeti vāgīśasyātra śuklatety ukteḥ //
T02abhnispu:90: iha vakṣyamāneṣu ca mandaleṣu yasyā māṇḍaleyadevatāyā mukhyato yatsthānam ucyate tasmin saiva pradhānatayā maṇḍaleśabhimukhī /
T02abhnispu:92: atra kūṭāgārasya vajrabhūmyādiparito vajrapañjaraṃ rakṣācakraṃ dharmodayā ceti trayaḥ parikarāḥ /
T02abhnispu:93: tatra vajrapañjaraṃ vakṣyamānānām api sarveṣāṃ kūṭāgārāṇāṃ rakṣācakraṃ (Am 232)
T02abhnispu:95: lekhyakūṭāgārāṇāṃ tu dharmadhātusvarūpadharmodayāyā dharmadhātvantargatasya vā sūcakaṃ likhanam uktaṃ vajrāvalyām //
T02abhnispu:96: yathā bāhyaṃ tathādhyātmam ity utpannakramamaṇḍalapratipādanākṛtena lokadhātoś cakravāḍasūcakaṃ vajrāvalīlikhanaṃ ca niyamenaiva /
T02abhnispu:99: api ca śūnyataiva bhagavatī nikhilavighnaughaṃ samūlam unmūlayituṃ prabhavatīti tadadhimokṣadṛḍhatvam evādarotpādanāya rakṣācakralikhanaṃ na varṇitaṃ lekhyamaṇḍaleṣu /
T02abhnispu:100: bhāvyamaṇḍaleṣu tu kvacid eva tadbhāvanoktā na sarveṣu /
T02abhnispu:101: vighnaghātānantaraṃ śūnyatāpraveśād bhāvyamaṇḍale 'pi rakṣācakraṃ nāsty ato na likhyate caitat /
T02abhnispu:102: evaṃ tarhi vajraprākāram api cakravāḍasūcakaṃ na likhitavyam /
T02abhnispu:105: nahi bhagavatā vajraprākārasya dvitīyavārotpattiḥ kvacid uktā //
T02abhnispu:107: sakṛd utpannam eva hi vajrabhūbandhaprākārādikaṃ samastasamāropaśūnyatāsvabhāvaṃ māyāmayam avatiṣṭhata eva /
T02abhnispu:109: kaiścit tu kvacid rakṣācakram api likhituṃ saṃmanyate //
